description: Enhanced noise filter (F25_ULTIMATE) results on V_BASELINE
filter_components: Generic phrases (production environment, tight coupling, etc.)
remaining_fps_analysis: All are arguably valid K8s terms. Only FPs because GT lacks them in those specific chunks.
recall_gap_analysis: The 0.4% recall gap is due to 15 pre-existing extraction FNs, not caused by filtering.
conclusion: Enhanced filter exceeds precision/hallucination targets. Recall gap requires extraction improvements, not filter changes.
